description: Numbers n that are primitive solutions to n^2 = a^2 + b^2 + c^2 (a,b,c > 0).
comments: These are the odd numbers excluding 1 and 5. Every term in A005767 is n*2^k for some k.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, RALPH PETERSON (ralphp(AT)LIBRARY.NRL.NAVY.MIL)
extensions: Name corrected by _T. D. Noe_, Nov 12 2010
